events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as related to a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to assist with the refund case regarding the wrong item.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to start the refund?
I have attached the photos showing the incorrect product and included my order number 123456789 for your review.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund immediately and provide a prepaid return label for the wrong item.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and help with the return shipment.
The refund has been issued, and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can help you with today.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day.
